-- 3rd-party licenses --
* The BinaryNotes compiler uses JAXB Reference implementation (http://jaxb.dev.java.net) 
Licensed under COMMON DEVELOPMENT AND DISTRIBUTION LICENSE (CDDL) Version 1.0
(see licenses\3rdparty\cddl.txt)

* BinaryNotes uses JUnit for Java (only for tests, not used at runtime).
Licensed under Common Public License Version 1.0 (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/cpl.php)

* BinaryNotes uses CSUnit for .NET (only for tests, not used at runtime)
Licensed under own license (see licenses\3rdparty\csunit_license.txt)

* The first version of the ASN.1 grammar was based upon the one posted by Vivek Gupta
  Tue Nov 11, 2003 14:29 on the ANTLR site. (ASN1_grammar.zip)
